arStrings.szText: This is a placeholder Lore entry. Make sure to use the correct Speaker record on the lines and enter the character name in the Conversation data.
This is a second line of Lore. Keep these conversations within 1-2 lines.
This is a placeholder Lorebook entry. This conversation should be duplicated and used to populate other lorebooks. Always ensure that you have created and attached the appropriate NPC Speaker.
This is a second line of dialogue. As a rule Lorebooks should stick to around 3 to 4 sentences of lore.
